title: Wilson's historical, traditionary, and imaginative tales of the borders, and of Scotland :
author: Wilson, John Mackay
snippet: The effect on my nerves seemed electrical — I clapped my hands, and sprung from my seat: " Was I not certain of it! Did I not foresee it!" I exclaimed.
